modName: Mjoll the Lioness Silent at last
summary: \"When I drew Grimsever, I think the poor man soiled his armor!\" Well, if you\'re like me and sneaking around and have to hear this constantly and are tired of it. Fear not soiling your armor any more!
descriptionHtml: This is a simple tweak that removes lines of dialog from Mjoll the Lioness. She\'s a great companion if only she\'d stop talking. I left the other dialog options on her like when you meet her and other unusual situations where you\'d expect her to say something.
author: Etennyson
